bubble.part1: Hi, I’m Jarno, a software engineer based in Rotterdam.
bubble.part2: In my free time you can find me wandering in the woods with my favourite [doge](https://www.instagram.com/shibabooboo/?hl=en), reading books or just drinking Belgian beers with my friends.
bubble.part3: Thanks for stopping by! Scroll down to check out the projects I’ve been working on.

contact.title: Do you have questions or are you interested in a collaboration?
contact.subtitle: Don’t hesitate to reach out.
